# Wunderkind (formerly BounceX)

## Examples

```html
<amp-ad
  type="wunderkind"
  data-site-id=""
  data-campaign-id=""
>
</amp-ad>
```

### Required parameter

-   `data-site-id`
-   `data-campaign-id`

## Configuration

This tag is not meant to be included directly in your page. You should use the `auto-amp-ads` extension with `type="wunderkind"`
